title: Lumiere

properties.name: description
properties.value: Lumiere is a vampyre located in the Sisterhood Sanctuary. He can be found on the eastern balcony overlooking the Nightmare's arena.

Lumiere

Advanced data
NPC ID9408

Lumiere is a vampyre located in the Sisterhood Sanctuary. He can be found on the eastern balcony overlooking the Nightmare's arena.

He is responsible for lighting all of the candles around the sanctuary, as a punishment for his sins. The punishment has driven him somewhat mad, as when he talks to the player, he believes them to be a figment of his imagination.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • "Lumière" is the French word for "light".

'''Lumiere''' is a [[vampyre]] located in the [[Sisterhood Sanctuary]]. He can be found on the eastern balcony overlooking [[the Nightmare]]'s arena.

He is responsible for lighting all of the candles around the sanctuary, as a punishment for his sins. The punishment has driven him somewhat mad, as when he talks to the player, he believes them to be a figment of his imagination.
